pageContext.claim: “Bernie Sanders, 'The Economy is doing well, and I'm sure I don't have to give Trump any credit - I'm sure he'll take all the credit that he wants.' Wrong Bernie, the Economy is doing GREAT, and would have CRASHED if my opponent (and yours), Crooked Hillary Clinton, had ever won!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump inherited an economy that was in the middle of one of the longest post-World War II economic expansions on record. There is no evidence it would not have continued if Clinton had been elected.
